member.name: M:Akka.TestKit.NUnit.TestKit.#ctor(Akka.Actor.ActorSystem)
member.summary: Create a new instance of the for NUnit class. If no is passed in, a new system with will be created.

member.name: M:Akka.TestKit.NUnit.TestKit.#ctor(Akka.Configuration.Config,System.String)
member.summary: Create a new instance of the for NUnit class. A new system with the specified configuration will be created.
member.param: The configuration to use for the system.
Optional: the name of the system. Default: "test"

member.name: M:Akka.TestKit.NUnit.TestKit.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a new instance of the for NUnit class. A new system with the specified configuration will be created.
member.param: The configuration to use for the system.

member.name: M:Akka.TestKit.NUnit.TestKit.InitializeActorSystemOnSetUp
member.summary: This method is called before each test run, it initializes the test including creating and setting up the ActorSystem.

member.name: M:Akka.TestKit.NUnit.TestKit.ShutDownActorSystemOnTearDown
member.summary: This method is called after each test finishes, which calls into the AfterAll method.

member.name: M:Akka.TestKit.NUnit.TestKit.AfterAll
member.summary: This method is called when a test ends. If you override this, make sure you either call base.AfterTest() or TestKitBase.Shutdown to shut down the system. Otherwise you'll leak memory.

member.name: M:Akka.TestKit.NUnit.TestKit.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:Akka.TestKit.NUnit.TestKit.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.
member.param:
if set to true the method has been called directly or indirectly by a user's code. Managed and unmanaged resources will be disposed.
if set to false the method has been called by the runtime from inside the finalizer and only unmanaged resources can be disposed.
